# Notes

error catching function / control flow

```{r}
x=7
y=4

if (x%%2==1 & y%%2 == 0)
{stop("x odd y even")
} else if (x > 3 && y <= 3) {
  print('Hello World')
} else if (x > 3) {
  print("!dlrow olleH")
} else if (x <= 3) {
  print('something else...')
} 


```
